name: Sticky Ships
description:
Sticky Ships is my take on the Space shooter Genre, with a meta twist.  I plan to add more content to Sticky Ships as time goes on. The content will add more interactions with INFY. As well as a few more ways to customize your ship.

Controls

Move - arrow keys or W,A,S,D

Shoot - Space Bar

I have a discord server so if you want to join click here.

Credits

Music by Shnarbellnoff

Everything else by TakoByte
